how.ctaLine: To speed up your quote: city, volume, date and access.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to the most common questions.

items.q: How can I get a quote quickly?
items.a: Share the city, estimated volume (m³), desired date and access constraints. If you may need a pump, mention it.

items.q: What do you need to plan the delivery?
items.a: Exact address, site access, preferred time slot, expected pace, and a contact person on site.

items.q: Do you provide technical support on site?
items.a: Yes, depending on the need. We guide you on what to provide and what constraints to anticipate.

items.q: What types of projects do you deliver to?
items.a: Residential, infrastructure, planning works, and public/private projects — with clear planning to secure pace.

side.title: Need a quick quote?
side.desc: Prepare: city, volume (m³), desired date and access constraints. If needed, mention pump.
side.tip: The more precise the request, the faster the response.

hero.title: Request a quote
hero.subtitle: Provide the essential details (city, estimated volume, date). Our team will respond quickly to confirm and schedule delivery.

form.title: Quote form
form.subtitle: Fill it in 1 minute. The more precise it is, the faster we respond.
form.name: Name / Company
form.consent: By submitting, you agree to be contacted regarding your quote.

success.title: Request sent ✅
success.desc: Thank you. Our team will contact you shortly to confirm the details.

side.title: Direct contact
side.subtitle: To speed things up: send your details via WhatsApp.
